H0.text: Which British playwright wrote the screenplay for the 1998 film 'Shakespeare In Love'. Alan Bennett

H1.text: Which British playwright wrote the screenplay for the 1998 film 'Shakespeare In Love'. David Hare

H2.text: Which British playwright wrote the screenplay for the 1998 film 'Shakespeare In Love'. Michael Frayn

H3.text: Which British playwright wrote the screenplay for the 1998 film 'Shakespeare In Love'. Stoppard

A4.text: Stoppard wrote the screenplay for Shakespeare in Love (1998) with Marc Norman.
